column1: # Performance Monitoring Events for Intel Atom Processors Based on the Tremont Microarchitecture - V1.00
# Copyright (c) 2007 - 2017 Intel Corporation. All rights reserved.

column4: BriefDescription
Counts the number of instructions retired. (Fixed event)
Counts the number of unhalted core clock cycles. (Fixed event)
Counts the number of unhalted reference clock cycles at TSC frequency. (Fixed event)
Page walk completed due to a demand load to a 4K page.
Page walk completed due to a demand load to a 2M or 4M page.
Counts memory requests originating from the core that miss in the last level cache. If the platform has an L3 cache, last level cache is the L3, otherwise it is the L2.
Counts memory requests originating from the core that reference a cache line in the last level cache. If the platform has an L3 cache, last level cache is the L3, otherwise it is the L2.
Counts the number of unhalted core clock cycles.
Counts the number of unhalted reference clock cycles at TSC frequency.
Page walk completed due to a demand data store to a 4K page.
Page walk completed due to a demand data store to a 2M or 4M page.
Counts the number of times there was an ITLB miss and a new translation was filled into the ITLB.
Page walk completed due to an instruction fetch in a 4K page.
Page walk completed due to an instruction fetch in a 2M or 4M page.
Counts the number of instructions retired.
Counts the number of branch instructions retired for all branch types.
Counts the number of mispredicted branch instructions retired.
Counts the number of load uops retired.
Counts the number of store uops retired.
